TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit LearnerFeatureSelectionTransform extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Selects the slots for which the absolute value of the corresponding weight in a linear learner is greater than a threshold. Instantiates a DropSlots transform to actually drop the slots.

Docs.summary: Returns a score for each slot of the features column.
